After some quick discussion over cups of tea at issyl0's Science Museum Visit, it was formulated that we should organise a GeekNic in London during the Summer Holidays. After everyone enjoyed the day so much, it makes sense to turn this into a "Family Event".

(Of course, Children remain responsibilities of their respective parents!)

There's not much here to think of yet, but please add your ideas.

'''Doodle Poll now closed! Date is the 8th of August 2010 The preliminary start time is 1pm with an estimated finish of around 4pm. '''

=== Location ===
The Location is '''Hyde Park''', meet at Speakers Corner and then move onto grass.

==== Getting to Hyde Park ====
'''Tube''': 
* Marble Arch (~0.3 mile, 8 to 10 mins walk) - '''Central''' Line
* Hyde Park Corner (~0.7 mile, 15 mins walk) - '''Piccadilly''' Line
* Knightsbridge (~ 0.8 mile, 18 mins walk) - '''Piccadilly''' Line
* Green Park (~1.1 miles, 25 mins walk) - '''Victoria''', '''Piccadilly''' and '''Jubilee''' Lines.

'''Bus''': 
Main Stop: Hyde Park Corner (~1 mile, 15 mins walk) - Bus Route(s):
* '''North London''': 6, 7, 10, 16, 52, 73, 82, 390, 414
* '''South London''': 2, 36, 137, 436
* '''West London''': 9, 10, 14, 19, 22, 52, 74, 148, 414
* '''East London''': 8, 15, 30, 38, 274

'''Cycle''':

There are several TfL Barclays Cycle Hire ("Boris Bike") points around Hyde Park/Speakers Corner.

A map of docking stations can be found here: https://web.barclayscyclehire.tfl.gov.uk/maps

Speaker's Corner is at the top right of Hyde Park, near Marble Arch tube station.

'''Car''':
